recommendations.node_path: Metastatic Breast Cancer Treatment Decision (ESMO 2021/24) -> Initial Biopsy, Biomarker & Staging Assessment (updated) -> Breast Cancer Subtype Classification -> HER2‑Positive Breast Cancer -> Chemotherapy Contraindicated & HR‑Negative
recommendations.rationale: Patient has HER2+ metastatic breast cancer. HER2-positive status supports anti-HER2 therapy.
